trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There was one other sighting in Oklahoma City on or around April 26th 2012
divs: sighting detailsim a believer now! my wife and i were in the back yard between 9:30 to 10. the sky was cloudy. i looked up at a passing plane. headed north right over us. i saw behind it at a short distance a round object. gray\white seemed to have circles within circles from outer edge to center. looked like a full moon in shape and color. the movement was floaty ? it seemd to move in one general direction with slight left or right movements. thats it. really can't believe what we were seeing but know it wasn't a ballon... i was getting my phone out of my pocket while looking and getting my camera turned on. i filmed the whole thing but it was dark and could not see anything. i just watched the video and it was more like 1 to 2 mins of seeing this. so upset that i don't have it recorded!!!! however from now on i will look up more often
Summary: cloudy night. my wife and I saw a plane above us then noticed a round object looking like a full moon following plane across the sky behind plane.
